name: ts-for-gir
description: Typescript .d.ts generator from GIR for gjs and node-gtk

scripts.update:submodules: git submodule update --init --recursive && git submodule foreach git pull origin master
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run regress && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.test:ava: npm run build:ts && npm run build:test:ava && ava tmp/test/ava/test.js
scripts.test:girs: npm run update:submodules && npm run build:types && npm run validate:all
scripts.test:girs:gjs: npm run update:submodules && npm run build:types:gjs && npm run validate:gjs
scripts.test:girs:node: npm run update:submodules && npm run build:types:node && npm run validate:node
scripts.regress: npm run clear && npm run build:ts && npm run start -- generate --configName='.ts-for-gir.regress.rc.js' && npm run validate
scripts.build: npm run clear:build && npm run lint && npm run build:ts
scripts.build:types: npm run clear:types && npm run start -- generate --configName='.ts-for-gir.all.rc.js'
scripts.build:types:gjs: npm run clear:types:gjs && npm run start -- generate --configName='.ts-for-gir.all.rc.js' --environments=gjs
scripts.build:types:node: npm run clear:types:node && npm run start -- generate --configName='.ts-for-gir.all.rc.js' --environments=node
scripts.validate:all: npm run validate && npm run validate:node
scripts.clear: npm run clear:build && npm run clear:types
scripts.clear:types: npm run clear:types:gjs && npm run clear:types:node
